languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс отрывается от вас, его подрагиваюшее дыхание касается вашего уха.{/n} "Я думал, что потерял тебя навсегда. Сколько суток я провел, пытаясь отыскать твой след в черноте Простора... я чуть умом не тронулся, {name}... быть может, и тронулся немного..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс отрывается от вас и нежно прижимает вашу голову к своей груди. Его подрагиваюшее дыхание касается вашего уха.{/n} "Я думал, что потерял тебя навсегда. Сколько суток я провел, пытаясь отыскать твой след в черноте Простора... я чуть умом не тронулся, {name}... быть может, и тронулся немного..."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tears himself away from you, his ragged breaths brushing against your ear.{/n} "I thought I had lost you forever. I spent days and nights trying to pick up your trail in the blackness of the Expanse... It almost drove me mad, {name}... Perhaps it did a little..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс отрывается от вас, его подрагиваюшее дыхание касается вашего уха.{/n} "Я думал, что потерял тебя навсегда. Сколько суток я провел, пытаясь отыскать твой след в черноте Простора... я чуть умом не тронулся, {name}... быть может, и тронулся немного..."

{n}Heinrix tears himself away from you, his ragged breaths brushing against your ear.{/n} "I thought I had lost you forever. I spent days and nights trying to pick up your trail in the blackness of the Expanse... It almost drove me mad, {name}... Perhaps it did a little..."

{n}Heinrix tears himself away from you, his ragged breaths brushing against your ear.{/n} "I thought I had lost you forever. I spent days and nights trying to pick up your trail in the blackness of the Expanse... It almost drove me mad, {name}... Perhaps it did a little..."

languages.text: {n}海因里希依依不舍地松开了你，他粗重的呼吸声拂过你的耳边。{/n}“我以为我再也见不到你了。我日夜不停，在漆黑的科罗努斯扩区中寻找你的踪迹……这几乎快把我逼疯了，{name}……或许我真的有点发疯了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tears himself away from you, his ragged breaths brushing against your ear.{/n} "I thought I had lost you forever. I spent days and nights trying to pick up your trail in the blackness of the Expanse... It almost drove me mad, {name}... Perhaps it did a little..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希依依不舍地松开了你，他粗重的呼吸声拂过你的耳边。{/n}“我以为我再也见不到你了。我日夜不停，在漆黑的科罗努斯扩区中寻找你的踪迹……这几乎快把我逼疯了，{name}……或许我真的有点发疯了……”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se aparta de ti, rozando tu oreja con su respiración rasgada.{/n} «Pensaba que la había perdido para siempre. Pasé día tras día y noche tras noche buscando su rastro en la oscuridad de la Extensión... Casi me volvió loco, {name}... Y no puedo negar que en parte lo hizo...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tears himself away from you, his ragged breaths brushing against your ear.{/n} "I thought I had lost you forever. I spent days and nights trying to pick up your trail in the blackness of the Expanse... It almost drove me mad, {name}... Perhaps it did a little..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se aparta de ti, rozando tu oreja con su respiración rasgada.{/n} «Pensaba que la había perdido para siempre. Pasé día tras día y noche tras noche buscando su rastro en la oscuridad de la Extensión... Casi me volvió loco, {name}... Y no puedo negar que en parte lo hizo...».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、あなたから身を引き離す。彼の荒い息があなたの耳をかすめる。{/n}「永遠にあなたを失ったと思った。昼も夜も、エクスパンスの漆黒の闇の中であなたの足跡をたどろうとして…気が狂いそうだった、{name}…いや、少し狂っていたかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tears himself away from you, his ragged breaths brushing against your ear.{/n} "I thought I had lost you forever. I spent days and nights trying to pick up your trail in the blackness of the Expanse... It almost drove me mad, {name}... Perhaps it did a little..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、あなたから身を引き離す。彼の荒い息があなたの耳をかすめる。{/n}「永遠にあなたを失ったと思った。昼も夜も、エクスパンスの漆黒の闇の中であなたの足跡をたどろうとして…気が狂いそうだった、{name}…いや、少し狂っていたかもしれない」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix recule légèrement la tête, interrompant votre baiser, mais vous sentez son souffle fiévreux tout contre votre oreille.{/n} « J'ai cru vous avoir perdue à jamais. J'ai passé des jours et des nuits à essayer de retrouver votre trace dans les ténèbres des Étendues... J'ai failli devenir fou, {name}... En fait, je suis peut-être devenu un peu fou... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tears himself away from you, his ragged breaths brushing against your ear.{/n} "I thought I had lost you forever. I spent days and nights trying to pick up your trail in the blackness of the Expanse... It almost drove me mad, {name}... Perhaps it did a little..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix recule légèrement la tête, interrompant votre baiser, mais vous sentez son souffle fiévreux tout contre votre oreille.{/n} « J'ai cru vous avoir perdue à jamais. J'ai passé des jours et des nuits à essayer de retrouver votre trace dans les ténèbres des Étendues... J'ai failli devenir fou, {name}... En fait, je suis peut-être devenu un peu fou... »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hastige Atemzüge streifen dein Ohr, als er sich von dir losreißt.{/n} "Ich dachte, ich hätte Euch für immer verloren. Ich habe tage- und nächtelang Eure Spur in der Schwärze der Ausdehnung verfolgt ... Das hat mich beinahe wahnsinnig gemacht, {name} ... Vielleicht wirklich ein bisschen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tears himself away from you, his ragged breaths brushing against your ear.{/n} "I thought I had lost you forever. I spent days and nights trying to pick up your trail in the blackness of the Expanse... It almost drove me mad, {name}... Perhaps it did a little..."

Ich habe tage- und nächtelang Eure Spur in der Schwärze der Ausdehnung verfolgt ... Das hat mich beinahe wahnsinnig gemacht, {name} ... Vielleicht wirklich ein bisschen ..."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kendini senden çekiyor. Düzensiz nefesi, kulağına hafifçe dokunuyor.{/n} "Seni ebediyen kaybettiğimi sandım. Enginlik'in karanlığında izini bulmak için günlerce, gecelerce uğraştım... Neredeyse aklımı yitiriyordum {name}... Belki de yitirmeye başlamışımdır..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix tears himself away from you, his ragged breaths brushing against your ear.{/n} "I thought I had lost you forever. I spent days and nights trying to pick up your trail in the blackness of the Expanse... It almost drove me mad, {name}... Perhaps it did a little..."
